## Course Presentations

Interesting in learning more about the theory of computation? Checkout
these slide decks to learn more! Each deck explores topics in Python programming
and theoretical machines. Finally, make sure to review the [course
schedule](../schedule/index.qmd) for more details about how these slides connect
to various course projects.

:::{#featured-presentations}
:::

## Team Presentations

Interesting in learning more about the theory of computation from the
perspective of students who are exploring the topic? Checkout these slide decks
to learn more! While these slides are not guaranteed to be correct, they should
show the growth of a learner as they develop their knowledge and skills as a
proofgrammer.

:::{#team-presentations}
:::
